nodes.text: Kamtro grassticks were a type of foodstuff available at the Canto Casino Hotel in the city of Canto Bight on the planet Cantonica. The Wermal salesbeing Kedpin Shoklop noticed kamtro grassticks being served at midmeal in the Canto Casino Hotel during his stay there in 34 ABY.

Kamtro grassticks were mentioned in the 2017 short story "Rules of the Game," written by Saladin Ahmed for the novella collection Canto Bight, which was released as part of the Journey to Star Wars: The Last Jedi multimedia project.
